content.rendered:
The following individuals have shown generous support for the Canadian Chopin Society as Founding Members:

  • William Aide
  • Mona Al-Kazemi
  • Araxie Altounian
  • Ellen Annor-Adjei and Richard Pyne
  • Casimir Bak
  • Teresa and Zbigniew Berezowski
  • Gloria and Rudy Bies
  • Slough Bolton
  • Walter Bryk
  • Catherine Bulanda
  • Anita and Doug Burke
  • Maria Case
  • Rebecca Chan
  • Sam Chan
  • Wanda Chmiel
  • Irene and Ted Cieciura
  • Joan and Julian Ciupak
  • Isabella Cuervo-Lorens
  • Tatiana and Grzegorz Czajkowski
  • Anna Julia David
  • Mariola and Piotr Dejnicki
  • Maria and Pawel Dubicki
  • Alexandra and Boleslaw Fujarczuk
  • Anju and Ted Fujarczuk
  • June and Karl Fujarczuk
  • Teresa Fujarczuk
  • Marina Glista
  • Rochelle and Greg Glista
  • Barbara Glogowski
  • Mark Gorlewski
  • Lisa Gould and Richard Leicht
  • Thomas Green
  • Gladys and Ben Grys
  • Krzysztof Grzymski
  • Czeslaw Kepa
  • Krystyna Kepa
  • Bernice and Michael Kinal
  • Zenon Konopka
  • Halina and Edward Kossack
  • Alicia and Michal Kowalczyk
  • Emily Krula
  • Faye and Robert Kruzel
  • Czeslawa and Roman Krygiel
  • Lee Kum-Sing
  • Stella Lachoski
  • Teresa Lasiuk and Michael Carruthers
  • Elizabeth Lau
  • Diana Leicht and Anthony Reitmeier
  • Tung (Ashley) Leung
  • Nora Lever
  • Grace Lin
  • Julia Loewen
  • Anna and Henry Lopinski
  • Frances and John Lopinski
  • Greg Lopinski and An Ngo
  • Janet Lopinski
  • Armandina Maziarczyk
  • Lily and Ron Mech
  • Valerie Merlo
  • Eva Michalak
  • Leslie Michalak
  • Maria Michalak
  • Lady and Walter Misek
  • Elizabeth Morgan
  • Hanna Namowicz
  • James Parker
  • Christine Pawelek-Dearman
  • Christine and John Perchal
  • Alice Piotrowski
  • Diane and Joe Pogorzelski
  • Artur Prazmo
  • Catherine and Andrew Alfred Rabo
  • Elizabeth and Mark Rabo
  • Mark Christopher Rabo
  • Kristina and Stan Reitmeier
  • The W. Reymont Foundation
  • Jadwiga Rosinska
  • Janice and Paul Sabourin
  • Mark Sarnecki
  • Victoria Scott
  • Irene Sepp and Frank Sobolak
  • Adele and Jack Simpson
  • Stanislawa Skrok
  • Hania and Witold Sokolski
  • Ryta and Robert Stachula
  • Philip Stefaniak
  • Krzysztof Stepien
  • Wanda and Edward Stroz
  • Richard Styka
  • Konrad Swierczek
  • Mariola and Janusz Swierczek
  • Paulina Swierczek
  • Frances and Albin Trella
  • Alvena Tyrala
  • Julita Tyszewicz
  • Lorraine and Ed Uba
  • Jane Underwood
  • Alan Walker
  • Danuta and Zygmunt Warszawski
  • Jadwiga and Zygmunt Wojtas
  • Beatrice and Mark Wolnik
  • Karen Yuen
  • Carla Zabek and Ralph Cuervo-Lorens
  • Elizabeth and Joseph Zabek

In Memoriam Donations

In memory of Marianne Langhorne Turner
In memory of Dr. Endre Gaal
